title: Bulk Accessibility Checker
creator: EXPERTE.com
description: Bulk Accessibility Checker crawls a website and automatically checks the accessibility of each subpage. This helps to find accessibility issues on the whole website, not just on a single page.
guideline: WCAG 2.1 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.1
WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
automated: Groups of web pages or web sites
